description: Detects Accessing to lsass.exe by Powershell Author: oscd.community, Natalia Shornikova. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Accessing WinAPI in PowerShell for Credentials Dumping
query: (winlog.channel:"Microsoft\-Windows\-Sysmon\/Operational" AND winlog.event_id:("8" OR "10") AND process.executable:*\\powershell.exe AND winlog.event_data.TargetImage:*\\lsass.exe)
